review: My visit was actually pretty good. The dentist was super friendly, and the whole process was quick and painless.
Good experience with honest explanation about the issue and helpful staff . Appointment was on time .

Dr Aman did a great job and was extremely patient and friendly with my son. The clinic was clean and  hygienic . My son was very comfortable in his first ever experience. Will surely go again for regular check ups.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I went to Dr Aman clinic for treatment of broken tooth and mouth ulcer for my 2yr kid. Children are very irritable especially if you take them to Doctor. My baby started crying as soon as we entered the clinic but Dr Aman and is staff took very good care of the situation , played cartoon channel in waiting room and also played YouTube videos in diagnosing room (really appreciate ). Dr. Aman gave full time to us and explained the problem and solution almost 3-4 times to me and my wife (as we have to take baby out of the clinic since he was crying there).
Positive : Ambience, Dr expertise, patience , explanation of problem and solution
Negative : Can’t see any, May be fee , but you are getting facilities for that.

My 6 year old daughter's milk tooth was shaking since a couple of weeks but refusing to fall out. It started hurting her a couple of days ago and started bleeding last night at 7.30pm. Despite the fact that the clinic closing time was 7.30pm, Dr. Aman waited for us and within minutes had extracted the tooth. My daughter felt no pain or discomfort. Their clinic in gk 2 is lovely and I am very pleased with my experience. Dr. Aman is gentle and put my daughter at ease. He is extremely professional and competent.

Loved the way they made the clinic so child friendly. We took our 2.5yr old and she was so comfortable to get her treatment. The staff was absolutely friendly and extremely courteous. I couldn’t believe the high quality service and thorough explanations of issue. 100% recommendations for young parents to take their kiddos to this clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I'm really happy and satisfied with my treatment..
I'm so lucky to be apart of your patient...

So in my experience being a doctor it is very necessary to friendly with their customers...so that they can feel free to tell their problems.
Sir/doctor you are very friendly and kind to your customer and it make us feel happy..I'm really glade to meet you as my doctor 🤗

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
the reception brings the child in you back .

you have some comics to ganesha tooth to browse

the tv is on nat geo

the vibration @ clinic is angelic with mickey mouse goofy around and soothing music you dont realise how time flies
+ be surprised 4 a kit chat break when it pains to divert your mind away .

its a place you come out smiling laughing bla bla.

review: Dr Aman is a blessing . He handled the tooth extractions of my nephew perfectly . My nephew wants to go back to him soon . Cant expect a 5 yr old wanting to go to a doc ... Its Dr Aman's magic i guess & his friendly and 100% professional techniques. I am happy to go to Dr Aman all the way from Noida if my nephew can have painfree and stress free treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Root canal treatment done for me here was extremely painful and very little of the tooth structure was left behind - it was doubtful if this work was necessary in the first place. Crowns placed were very unnatural in their appearance and caused a lot of discomfort. Cost of treatment was quite high. It would have been a lot better had Dr Amandeep  been more empathetic and followed a conservative approach to preserving the teeth.

I am very happy with the treatment, both Dr. Aman & Dr. Karuna talked to me very politely. I was very hyper initially but gradually after talking to them I was relaxed.The procedure done was painless and suited my pocket.The veneers done by dr aman made my smile very attractive. Thanx doctors for your concern and treatment.

My daughter was having discoloration of front tooth.Dr Aman handled my child with love and affection and she was happily getting her treatment done.THe ambience of clinic is very good.Its child friendly clinic with slides ,swings,cartoon characters.Thanx doc.

Got my son extraction done from Dr. Aman. He is quite scared when he entered the clinic but after few miutes he become relaxed with the child friendly environment at Dr. Aman Tooth town. He didn't felt anything at the time of extraction also. Thank to Dr. Aman

Highly recommendable services by Dr. Aman's Tooth Town dental clinic. Dr.Aman carried forward my son dental treatment in very humble and easy way without any pain. Now my son don't have any pain, all thank to Dr. Aman. 
They have a very good team of specialized doctors as they called an oral surgeon for my wisdom tooth extraction, and it was painless.

Very neat n clean clinic, friendly environment , Humble doctors great team☺. Very well equipped clinic. In all a very nice experience, I would suggest all to visit the clinic as I find it the best  amongst other clinics, transparency dedication has been throughout the treatment.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,

By visiting the Dental Clinic, I believe the Doctor  is very good at his profession given  his explanations and the procedures involved in treating his patients.

God bless you Doctor 
🙏

Dr Aman’s way of doing the treatment is very impressive. He ease the patient in a entertaining way that you don’t get to feel that half of the work is already over. By the time you realise … his work is all done. His charges are comparatively lesser then many others in the locality. I would really love to refer him to others.

Excellent treatment and well trained doctor with polite behaviour . Clinic is well equipped  and very hygienic maintaining all COVID guideline.
Is always amazing service very quality of customer service and fantastic results. One of the only place in (CN) that is seriously highly recommended and takes very good care of you.
The experience was awesome. The hospitality was great.  They kept my ward at ease and did their job in a professional manner. Thank yu sir and madam.
Performing RCT on a 4 years old kid is a tough job n it was made so easy n fun here that my kid underwent the treatment happily
Dr Aman is a wonderful doctor whom the kids just love he was able to make our son very comfortable during and after the treatment. Good job done we r glad that we brought him to right doc and clinic
Doctor is very friendly and polite ,the treatment was really effective and I am happy with the treatment.thank you doctor
The extraction was very smooth. No swelling after removal of stitches. Best doctor and best ambience. My wife enjoyed X-box in the meantime.
I am very apprehensive before the treatment but the treatment done by Dr. Aman was very good. I didn't felt any pain. Thanks doctor.
Team of doctors is superb.i m really happy with the treatment.THanx dr aman's tooth town.I am smiling and will definitely refer you to my friends
Very satisfied with Dr Aman and hats off to the kind of patience he  has with kids. Now my son is not afraid and rather cooperates with the process.

It was a great experience. Dr Aman is  extremely skilled and very patient. My teeth needed scaling very badly since there were hard deposits. But the procedure was very smooth and there was neither any discomfort nor pain. 
Thank you Dr Aman.

The team is very friendly and listens to the patients calmly. Ambience is also good.
Thanks Dr. Aman's Tooth Town team of doctors.
Thanks Dr. Aman for providing me such a good treatment. Thanks to Dr. Aman's Tooth Town team of doctors for such a good treatment. Zero waiting time is the best part of this clinic.
We have wonderful experience with cooperative doctor and staff      thank you doctor has given our child very friendly atmosphere
Thanks to Dr. Aman team of doctors for giving me new teeth without any pain and discomfort. Highly recommended dental clinic.
Very good experience, thanks to my friend who refered me to Dr. Aman for my son dental treatment. My son is also very Happy with the treatment. Front teeth look like an original tooth now.
The doctor is really helpful and caring. My experience was absolutely comfortable and painless. The staff is also nice and courteous
The experience was very good and comfortable. The doctor and staff is helpful and supportive. I would surely recommend this clinic to other people

I went to Dr Aman's Tooth Town dental clinic for my dental cleaning and bleaching. Must say they have an amazing staff and clinic ambience is very hygienic. I will recommend my friends and family for any dental issue.

I am very thankful to Dr. Aman team of doctors. They got my implant supported denture so well, now I don't feel that I have duplicate set of teeth. Its like an 3rd set of natural teeth. Thank you one again.
Regards
Ms. Lilly
Very good, incredible helpful and well performed. Never felt distressed or uncomfortable. Best dental clinic ever visited.
He is a very kind and experienced doctor and ensures that the patient is not at any discomfort while carrying out the procedure..

My experience with Dr. Aman can really be termed as exceeding expectations,  considering his responsiveness, effective medical management and above all his follow up concern. Highly recommend him for an warm and effective treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Dr. Aman is an expert in his field. He has a very professional attitude and friendly at the same time.

Thank you doc for great experience and quality work you have done on my teeth.I m usually apprehensive about needles but the way u did RCT it was no sweat at all,infact I am ready for my next needle.its best place for apprehensive patients ,my family  and I am pleased with your personable services,see you soon.

My daughter enjoyed her dental treatment @ Dr. Aman's Tooth Town. The atmosphere of the clinic is so cool that kid don't get to know that they came to dental clinic. The operatory is also supercool, it is equipped with T.V, full wall mickey poster, and lot more for kids. Didn't expect this kind of clinic in India. Must visit for your kids dental treatment.
